elements.name: Verify user login for valid crendetials

steps.name: User should launch the browser and navigate to Amazon application
User wait for '5' seconds
User verify amazon logo present on the header screen
User mouse hover to Hello SignIN element
User click on signin button
User Enter the email id or mobile number in the login page
User click on continue button on login page
User verify the entered mobile number is displayed
User enter the password in the login page
User click on login button in the login page
User wait for '3' seconds
User verify the username present in the homepage header
User wait for '3' seconds

elements.name: User add the product using Menu navigation and verify the same in cart

steps.name: User mouse hover to shop by category menu
User select the menu 'Mobile' and the sub menu 'Tablets'
User verify the selected sub menu 'Tablets' displayed in the header
User wait for '3' seconds
User click check box Amazon prime and Cash on delivery in the filter
User wait for '3' seconds

steps.name: User select the first product and store the product name as 'First Product'
User switch to next tab and add the selected product to cart
User wait for '3' seconds
User verify the same product name 'First Product' present in the product detail page
User click on Add to Cart
User verify the message 'Added to Cart'

steps.name: User click on Amazon logo
User enter the product name 'Redmi Note 6' in the search feild
User wait for '2' seconds
User click on search button
User wait for '2' seconds
User click check box Amazon prime and Cash on delivery in the filter
User select the first product and store the product name as 'Redmi Note 6'
User switch to next tab and add the selected product to cart
User verify the same product name 'Redmi Note 6' present in the product detail page
User click on Add to Cart
User verify the message 'Added to Cart'
